docs.title: Welcome to Chessfield
docs.text: Chessfield is a JavaScript library for creating and manipulating chessboards. Whether you're building a chess game or a puzzle, Chessfield simplifies the process.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
Install Chessfield using npm:

npm install chessfield

Or use a CDN:

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chessfield@1.0.1/dist/chessfield.umd.js"></script>

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Basic example:

const container = document.getElementById('board');
const chessfield = new Chessfield(container, { orientation: 'white' });
